author: Bogdan Dimitriu
comment: Very useful app and quite user friendly. Please add support for Amex in the payment cards section

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content: Hello Bogdan, thank you for your request. The Amex card does not support online gateway ČSOB bank, by Amex card you can pay through the payment terminal mPOS in every our car.

author: Rodrigue Foulonneau
comment: Simple and reliable. Good app.

author: Maxim Tretiakov
comment: Great app, using it already for some while.unfortunately after the recent update I can't launch it anymore.. would appreciate some support here

author: Adler Mobasser
comment: CHANGE TO 5STAR - Excellent support and response on my issue below. Back to my favourite taxi service in Prague.  ----------------------------------------------------- I had been a silver member for quite some time now and have been actively using this service. But today I got an SMS that my price rates changed to basics again. I don't think I want to stay with Modrý Anděl this way...

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content: Hello Adler, your post belongs to another department, was handed over to the processing. Thank you.

author: Jozef Matejička
comment: Nefunguje registrace v D6633.

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content: Dobrý den pane Matejičko, mrzí nás vaše komplikace, nicméně neeuvidujeme žádný přístroj, v kterém by současná verze měla registrační problémy. Poprosíme Vás napsat nám email na on-line@modryandel.cz a váš problém vyřešíme. Děkujeme, Modrý anděl s.r.o.

author: Václav Dvořák
comment: Works without any issues.

author: Michael Bezdek
comment: Good app for "unexpected" trips

author: Andrea Colantoni
comment: The app works pretty well expect it usually takes ages to get a confirmation - even when all is already confirmed. Service-wise it's happened to me several times that the driver came late or is a no-show.
title: App ok but service so-so

author: Adam Běláč
comment: Vždycky mě odvezli bez problémů a za normální cenu tam kam jsem potřeboval..

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content: Dobrý den pane Běláči, těší nás Vaše spokojenost se službami a také s aplikací, rádi Vás kdykoliv opět dopravíme tam, kam budete potřebovat. Děkujeme a přejeme hezký večer, Váš Modrý anděl.

title: Odvoz za levno

author: Tomáš Červenka
comment: App didn't start / Nenačte se

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content: Dobrý den, pane Červenko, pokusíme se zjistit příčinu nenačítání aplikace, prosím, zašlete nám více informací (typ telefonu, verze androidu a přesný popis, co se zobrazí a co ne) pro ověření na on-line@modryandel.cz Děkujeme.

author: Michal Vrtiak
comment: Pri objednavaní vždycky dajú cenový odhad 21/km, ale vždy pošlú auto 28/km čo mi teda zrovna nepríde ako férová obchodná praktika.
title: Pekná appka, zavádzajúce ceny

author: Andrey Vinnitskiy
comment: Aplikace žádá destination adress pri objednávce z letiště, pri jeho zadní padá.
title: Objednávka z letiště ne funguje

author: JERROLD FRANKLIN
comment: I give up. For some reason they make me try to register. It got hung up, all I can see is several pages in Czech. I guess I'll just have to use AAA.

author: Marek Haller
comment: Perfect

author: Konstantin Dvornichenko
comment: Very good. Some small troubles in a case of 2 autos offer at the same time, but generally works.

author: Veronika Rose
comment: Jo, taky mi objednalo taxi 3x, takže mi pak volal řidič, když už jsem dávno spala. Takže teď už raději nezkouším....

author: Éva Naményi
comment: Like this application, sometimes the GPS spot is not the same where I actually am tho. (Never too far)
Pada + kdyz dam potvrzeni rezervace objedna taxi 3x. Nexus 5.
title: Super ale ne uplne

author: Petr Zatloukal
comment: Používám aplikaci několik let a maximální spokojenost, stejně i s touto taxi službou..

author: Jan Ruzicka
comment: Zadna reakce na objednavky ani po 25 min
title: Nepotvrzene rezervace

author: Ivona Virtanen
comment: Super app, skoro vzdy v poradku.

author: gopal krishnan
comment: Loved the quick response and the overall experience

author: Danny Bunyan
comment: Supr

author: Eiad CH
comment: I changed my mobile number and I need to keep my account with my new mobile number, its not updating nither on the web or the app..please advise

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content:
Please write your telephone number you want to change and too the new phone number, that add to your account.

Thank you.

Best regards

title: Change phone number

author: Tomáš Campr
comment: Supr aplikace, jedina chyba ze v notifikacich stale zustava viset, abych se zaregistroval ikdyz jsem uz davno zaregistroval a nepodarilo se mi ji zbavit.
title: Vyborna aplikace

author: Adler Mobasser
comment: quite impressed by the improvement of the app and the service

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content:
Dobrý den, cena 19,- pro TAXI standard je pouze v určité časy:
http://www.modryandel.cz/pro-klienty/cenik/specialni-nabidka/levnejsi-pres-online-rezervace
Většinu časů je pro taxi standard při on-line rezervacích stále sleva na 16,- za km.

title: Pretty good

comment: Vyborna, jen se občas zasekává. ...

author: Jan Stefan
comment: id like to choose the origin and the destination from map as it was before. sometimes i dont know the address im going from
title: Good one but add the map feature

author: Zdeněk Zikán
comment: Both the taxi service and this app are great. Simple and easy way how to order taxi, get price estimate, estimate when will the taxi arrive. That's how it should be.

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content: Děkujeme za pochvalu. Snažíme se průběžně naše služby vylepšovat.

title: Great both app and service

author: Jan Schneider
comment: Especially after the last update this app really has all you can think of...
title: Best taxi app

author: Petr Šmíd
comment: Nestabilní, pravidelně padá

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content: Dobrý den Petře, děkujeme za příspěvek, mrzí nás Vaše komplikace. Můžete prosím zkusit nainstalovat novou verzi 2.0.3 a v případě problémů nám poslat Váš kontakt na androidapp@modryandel.cz. My se s Vámi spojíme.

author: Václav Tichý
comment: Amazing app, amazing service(s).  I couldn't be more satisfied.

reply.author: Modrý anděl
reply.content: Děkujeme za pochvalu! Rádi slyšíme, že jste spokojen s našimi službami! :)

title: Unbelievable

author: Martin Marek
comment: Fast and very effective - i like it
title: All great

author: Šárka Podolová
title: Je videt pokrok oproti starsi verzi. Jsem spokojena, nejvic ocenuji moznost vytvorit si zalozky s nejcastejsimi jizdami

author: Daniel Brvnišťan
comment: If I chat using chat heads, the bubble often disappears and I lose draft. Alsso when I want to bring something forward (e-mail, Hangout... ;-) ), bubble stays on. It is just tooooo annoying way to bring FB to attention. Turning off. As if it would not be enough that there is separate FB app and FB chat app, this is third FB away to chat, bringing more clutter. Also, why clicking on bubble doesn't open full chat app? I have really big screen, but I still see only maybe 2-3 lines of message I am replying to.
title: Annoying instead of usable

author: Francois Planet
comment: This app is just great. Simple fast and user friendly!  I love the map for the location, especially when you don't necessarily know the address.
title: Excellent app

author: Paolo Fornaroli
comment: Tried to book twice, on saturday night and on sunday night. Nobody came, always waiting for confirmation. In the past it had worked well
title: Used to work well, now not anymore

author: Matej Michlik
comment: On some devices (mainly with software keys) the app does not resize, and you cannot access some fields/buttons. While unzooming the map with your position to the position of assigned taxicab the map very often resets to your position only, making it nearly unusable. Not possible to lock the position to the cab only. When ordering two cars, you can get wrong information on arrival of the second car. Not enough information about your orders. I also wanted to change the car, originally ordered with credit card terminal due to its arrival time, and it was not possible. Partially nontransparent VIP terms&conditions.
title: Works, but with bugs

author: A Google User
comment: Nadherni sluzba!!! Doporucuji

author: Pedro Carvalho
comment: Nice application, comes on the estimate time. New cars. Nice price.
title: Nice application
